    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • addPlug

        public boolean addPlug​(char end1,
                       char end2)
        Add a plug to the plugboard if it doesn't clash with any of the existing plugs. The maximum size of the set is 13. ( 13 pairs of 2 letter = 26 letters)
        Parameters:
        end1 - first end of the new plug
        end2 - second end of the new plug
        Returns:
        a boolean depending on whether the plug was added or not

      • getNumPlugs

        public int getNumPlugs​()
        Returns the size of the plugs set.
        Returns:
        an integer representing the number of plugs currently in the plugboard

      • clear

        public void clear​()
        Clear all the elements (plugs) in the plugs set

      • substitute

        public char substitute​(char letterIn)
        Substitute the character if there is a plug to do so.
        Parameters:
        letterIn - a character to substitute
        Returns:
        the substituted letter or the unchanged parameter letterIn
